name: BKV
description:
At BKV, they're passionate about direct marketing. They've been delivering integrated marketing solutions since 1981, so they really know what we’re doing. With a staff of over 100 direct marketers in Atlanta, they work alongside clients whose names show up on Fortune 500 lists and among the top nonprofit organizations in the world.
They experts address the entire marketing picture using a combination of traditional and digital media—all to ensure they’re measurably growing clients’ brands and sales.
